segments.text: We need to call an emergency meeting as soon as possible about this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Let me send a memo around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Schedule it for this afternoon , when Ken gets back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think he ’ s back today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that ’ s right . Go ahead anyways . I ’ ll fill him in . We can ’ t lose this order under any circumstances !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , it ’ s a big one .
segments.speaker: S2
